overview:
A lifelong writer, editor and content Creator, he enjoys communicating, and communities are one of his passions.       He is Communications Director of the Navigate Group, a complete service involving marketing, design, PR, copywriting, web  design and build. His role is to lead marketing and customer services, both externally with clients and internally with staff.  

Navigate are proud to have won a 3-year contract to provide PR, marketing and web services to Portsmouth International Port, Britain’s best connected ferry port; and to design the new website for Visit USA, the association which looks after the leading destination in the world.

In 2012 Navigate is focusing on design for print and the web, website development, content, PR, and contract publishing as our key marketing communications services. 

Having worked for The Times for 10 years he has launched, managed or re-launched more than 50 B2B publications, In the last 25 years.   Hobbies   include: Writing, books, film, theatre, and sport. Favourite sports are golf, tennis, cricket, football and rugby. 

  email: nick.keith@navigate-design.com
